title: [rclone v1.13] Duplicate file detected
body:
Hello.

First I want to thank you for the time you have spent to the development of this tool for file synchronization.

I am currently using `rclone` to synchronize files with Google Drive. Basically it is a backup of 2.5GB or so. When I try to do a synchronization, I get a message of duplicate files. Can this be related to that when making the initial copy I have obtained several retries due to have reached the limit for the transfer?

Below I paste the output from running the command:

```
# ./rclone copy /space/backup/ps382038.dreamhostps.com remote:Backup/ps382038.dreamhostps.com
2015/05/19 11:21:16 Google drive root 'Backup/ps382038.dreamhostps.com': Building file list
2015/05/19 11:22:16
Transferred:            0 Bytes (   0.00 kByte/s)
Errors:                 0
Checks:                 0
Transferred:            0
Elapsed time:  1m0.49053366s

2015/05/19 11:23:01 zahnarzt.berlin.to/20150518/tree/fileadmin/user_upload/right_images/Zahntechnik_Aufza�hlung-2.jpg: Duplicate file detected
2015/05/19 11:23:01 zahnarzt.berlin.to/20150518/tree/fileadmin/user_upload/right_images/Zahntechnik_Aufza�hlung-2.jpg: Duplicate file detected
2015/05/19 11:23:01 zahnarzt.berlin.to/20150518/tree/fileadmin/user_upload/right_images/Zahntechnik_Aufza�hlung-2.jpg: Duplicate file detected
2015/05/19 11:23:07 zahnarzt.berlin.to/20150518/tree/fileadmin/templates/powermail_33/Partials/Output/Field/Textarea.html: Duplicate file detected
2015/05/19 11:23:16
Transferred:            0 Bytes (   0.00 kByte/s)
Errors:                 0
Checks:                 0
Transferred:            0
Elapsed time:  2m0.491802151s

2015/05/19 11:23:35 kg.berlin.to/20150518/tree/typo3temp/pics/4f41c1064a.jpg: Duplicate file detected
2015/05/19 11:23:42 kg.berlin.to/20150518/tree/typo3temp/llxml/dialogs.xml_29cd6e9553.default.utf-8.cache: Duplicate file detected
2015/05/19 11:23:44 kg.berlin.to/20150518/tree/typo3temp/Cache/Data/l10n/be272a0252aede6cde91be8aa94b9bfa: Duplicate file detected
2015/05/19 11:23:49 kg.berlin.to/20150518/tree/typo3temp/Cache/Data/cache_classes/ajaxlogin: Duplicate file detected
2015/05/19 11:24:01 kg.berlin.to/20150518/tree/typo3conf/l10n/de/lang/de.locallang_alt_intro.xml: Duplicate file detected
2015/05/19 11:24:16
Transferred:            0 Bytes (   0.00 kByte/s)
Errors:                 0
Checks:                 0
Transferred:            0
Elapsed time:  3m0.489234045s

2015/05/19 11:24:49 Google drive root 'Backup/ps382038.dreamhostps.com': Waiting for checks to finish
2015/05/19 11:24:49 Google drive root 'Backup/ps382038.dreamhostps.com': Waiting for transfers to finish

Transferred:       418806 Bytes (   1.90 kByte/s)
Errors:                 0
Checks:             23383
Transferred:            1
Elapsed time:  3m35.311200904s
```

Thanks in advance for your reply.

Best regards,
Daniel
